errors.generic: An error has occurred. If th' error continues t' persist, join th' support guild.
errors.unknownChannel: Unknown channel. If 'tis th' correct channel, make sure I 'ave permission t' view it.
errors.unknownRole: Unknown role. make sure that th' role exists.
errors.missingPermissionChannelRead: I be missin' th' permissions `Read Messages` 'n/or `Read Message History` in th' active channel.
errors.missingPermissionChannelReaction: I be missin' th' permissions `Add Reactions` 'n/or `Use External Emojis` in th' active channel.
errors.missingPermissionChannelSend: I be missin' th' permission `Send Messages` in th' active channel.
errors.unknownMessageID: Unknown message. make sure th' message ID ye used be valid.
errors.setChannel: Set a channel first, then try this command again.
errors.setChannelOrMessage: Set a channel 'n message first, then try this command again.
errors.usedEmoji: Th' emoji in th' $pair pair be already used on this message.
errors.usedRole: Th' role in th' $pair pair be already used on this message.
errors.unknownMessage: Th' active message be unknown, check me permissions 'n that th' message still exists.
errors.unknownEmoji: I can nah use this emoji. If 'tis a custom emoji, make sure I be in th' guild where 'tis from
errors.suggestionID: Try again wit' a suggestion ID.
errors.suggestionRead: Unable t' get th' suggestion $suggestion in <#$channel>. make sure I 'ave th' permission `Read Messages` in th' channel, 'n that th' suggestion wasn't scuttled.
errors.suggestionSend: Unable t' send th' suggestion t' $channel. make sure I 'ave th' permissions `Read Messages`, `Send Messages`, 'n `Embed Links` in th' channel.
errors.suggestionRole: Ye needs th' <@&$role> role t' manage suggestions.
errors.maxReactions: There be too many reactions on this message. Discord's galleon can only support 20! Please add and set another message t' add more reaction roles.

suggestion.approvedMessageReason:
**Yer suggestion:**

$suggestion

**Has been approved wit' th' reason:**

$reason
suggestion.deniedMessageReason:
**Yer suggestion:**

$suggestion

**Has been denied wit' th' reason:**

$reason
suggestion.potentialMessageReason:
**Yer suggestion:**

$suggestion

**Has been potentially approved wit' th' reason:**

$reason
suggestion.invalidMessageReason:
**Yer suggestion:**

$suggestion

**Has been marked as invalid wit' th' reason:**

$reason

footer: **NOTE:** Th' `Zira` role needs t' be above th' role(s) ye've set, 'n needs t' 'ave th' `Manage Roles` permission t' give them.
userPermissions: Ye can nah use this command 'cause ye be missin' th' followin' permission(s):

message.help: Set th' active message or send a message t' th' active channel.

add.help: Add normal role(s) t' th' active message.
add.description: Ye can add multiple roles at once by providin' more emojis 'n roles. Ye 'ave t' use a comma t' separate each pair, see below fer an example.

list.help: List all roles that 'ave been setup.
list.title: $name | Role List
list.name: **Name:**

boardNotFound.title: Board Nah Found
boardNotFound.description: I was unable t' find that board. make sure ye 'ave starb'rd board ID, 'n that ye 'ave added **`ZiraDiscord`** t' th' board.

dm.success:
T' verify this board, create a card that has th' title set t' th' ID that has been sent t' ye. Aft ye 'ave done this, type `done` in this channel t' continue th' setup.

Ye will 'ave 5 minutes t' do this.
dm.error: I was unable t' send ye th' verification DM. make sure I can send ye a DM.

trello.time: Ye 'ave ran out o' time. try again.
trello.noCard: Unable t' find th' card. try again.
trello.validList: That ain't a valid list. input a valid list ID.
trello.pickNew: Type th' correspondin' number t' pick a list, or `none` t' nah pick a list fer new suggestions.
trello.pickNewTitle: Pick a List fer New Suggestions
trello.pickApprove: Type th' correspondin' number t' pick a list, or `none` t' nah pick a list fer approved suggestions.
trello.pickApproveTitle: Pick a List fer Approved Suggestions
trello.pickDenied: Type th' correspondin' number t' pick a list, or `none` t' nah pick a list fer denied suggestions.
trello.pickDeniedTitle: Pick a List fer Denied Suggestions
trello.pickPotential: Type th' correspondin' number t' pick a list, or `none` t' nah pick a list fer potential suggestions.
trello.pickPotentialTitle: Pick a List fer Potential Suggestions
trello.pickInvalid: Type th' correspondin' number t' pick a list, or `none` t' nah pick a list fer invalid suggestions.
trello.pickInvalidTitle: Pick a List fer Invalid Suggestions

role.disable: Anyone wit' th' correct permissions can use Zira's commands now
role.success: Now, only th' guild owner 'n scallywags who 'ave th' role $role can use Zira commands.

main.name: role <role | disable>
main.value: Set or scuttle which role can use commands.

edit.help: Edit a message sent by Zira in th' active channel.
edit.owner: That message has nah been sent by me.

toggle.help: Add toggled role(s) t' th' active message.
toggle.limit: Ye 'ave reached th' limit o' 6 toggled roles. Ye can get unlimited toggled roles by [donating](https://zira.ovh/premium)
toggle.over: Addin' these will result in ye reachin' th' limit o' toggled roles. Ye can get unlimited toggled 'n scuttle roles by [donating](https://zira.ovh/premium)

once.help: Added role(s) t' th' active message that can only be received once.

multi.help: Added an emoji that shall give multiple roles t' th' active message.
multi.params: <emoji> <role name | role mention> <role name | role mention>
multi.usedEmoji: That emoji be already in use on this message.

delete.noRoles: No roles are set on that message.
delete.good: All roles exist, none were scuttled.
delete.message: Unable t' scuttle th' role as it wasn't on th' specified message.

autorole.title: Auto Role
autorole.user:
Add a role that best be given when a user joins.

T' scuttle a role bein' used in autorole, jus' do th' command again.
autorole.userAdd: $role will be given when a user joins.
autorole.userRemove: $role will no longer be given when a user joins.
autorole.bot:
Add a role that best be given when a bot joins.

T' scuttle a role bein' used in autorole, jus' do th' command again.
autorole.botAdd: $role will be given when a bot joins.
autorole.botRemove: $role will no longer be given when a bot joins.

main.name: user <role name | role mention>
main.value: Set role(s) that shall be given when a user joins.

main.name: bot <role name | role mention>
main.value: Set role(s) that shall be given when a bot joins.

channel.description: Set which channels new, approved, denied, potential, 'n invalid suggestions will get sent t'.

submit.description: Set which channel that suggestion will only be allow t' be sent from.
submit.set: Suggestions will only be allow t' be sent from $channel
submit.disable: Suggestions can now be sent from any channel.

dm.on: A DM will get sent t' th' user o' a suggestion when th' suggestion gets approved, denied, potentialed, or invalidated, etc.
dm.off: Users will nah longer get DMs about suggestions.

reaction.on: Emojis will get reacted t' new suggestions.
reaction.off: Emojis will no longer get reacted t' new suggestions.

emojis.description: Set th' emojis that shall get reacted on new suggestions.
emojis.set: Th' emojis $emoji1, $emoji2 will get reacted t' new suggestions if reactions are turned on.

role.description: Limit managin' o' suggestions t' a certain role.
role.disable: Anyone wit' th' permission `Manage Guild` can approve/deny suggestions now.
role.set: Only users wit' th' role $role can approve/deny suggestions now.

main.name: channel <new | approved | denied | invalid | potential> <#channel>
main.value: Set which channels new, approved, 'n denied suggestions will get sent t'.

main.name: submit <#channel>
main.value: Limit th' sendin' o' suggestions t' one channel.

main.name: dm
main.value: Set whether or nah users should get a DM about thar suggestions.

main.name: reaction
main.value: Set whether or nah emojis best be reacted t' new suggestions.

main.name: emojis <emoji> <emoji>
main.value: Set th' emojis that shall get reacted on new suggestions.

main.name: role <role name | role mention>
main.value: Limit managin' o' suggestions t' a certain role.

remove.help: Added an emoji that shall scuttle a role t' th' active message.
remove.description: Ye can add a role when Zira be scuttlin' th' other role. Ye 'ave t' use a comma t' separate th' second role, see below fer an example.
remove.limit: Ye 'ave reached th' limit o' 6 scuttle roles. Ye can get unlimited scuttle 'n toggled roles by [donating](https://zira.ovh/premium)
remove.removeAdd: $role1 will be scuttled 'n $role2 will be given

submit.noChannel: Thar be no suggestion channel. set one.

maybe.success: Th' suggestion has been potentially approved.

invalid.success: Th' suggestion has been marked as invalid.

log.set: Whenever someone reacts t' get a role, 'twill be logged t'

prefix.error: Provide a prefix that's between 1 'n 10 characters 'n has at least one o' these characters in it: `.` `/` `?` `[` `]` `\` `<` `>` `-` `=` `+` `*` `^` `$` `!`.

colors.perms: I be missin' th' permission `Manage Roles`.
colors.none: No roles were created, as thar are already color roles.

leave.help: Send a message when a user leaves.
leave.placeholders:
$user ~~-~~ username
$mention ~~-~~ user mention
$guild ~~-~~ guild name
$membercount ~~-~~ new member count
leave.channelSet: Leave messages will get sent t'
leave.channelDisable: Leave messages will no longer get sent.
leave.messagePick: Remove a message below by doin' **z/leave remove ID**

main.name: channel <#channel | disable>
main.value: Set th' channel messages will get sent t' when a user leaves.

main.name: add <message>
main.value: Add a message t' send. Ye can 'ave multiple message fer a random message when a user leaves.

main.name: remove <ID>
main.value: Remove a message that has been set.

join.help: Send a message when a user joins.
join.placeholders:
$user ~~-~~ username
$mention ~~-~~ user mention
$guild ~~-~~ guild name
$membercount ~~-~~ new member count
join.channelSet: Join messages will get sent t'
join.channelDisable: Join messages will no longer get sent.
join.messagePick: Remove a message below by doin' **z/join remove ID**

main.name: channel <#channel | disable>
main.value: Set th' channel messages will get sent t' when a user joins.

main.name: add <message>
main.value: Add a message t' send. Ye can 'ave multiple message fer a random message when a user joins.

main.name: remove <ID>
main.value: Remove a message that has been set.

lang.help: Set th' language fer th' guild.
lang.translate: If ye wants Zira in a language that ain't on th' list above, ye can help translate Zira on [Crowdin](https://translate.zira.ovh)

vote.description: Ye can vote fer Zira below. Right now, thar are no rewards, but thar be a reward system in th' works fer th' future. Yer votes will be stored fer use if ye vote now, 'n will be useable when th' system be implemented, so all current votes will count. Ye can vote [here]($link)!

rooms.title: Private Rooms Setup!
rooms.description: Don't sync permissions if ye move th' channel t' a category. I'll needs th' permission `Manage Channels` t' create 'n scuttle private rooms.
